### matchFoldGlobalOffset() {#aad04adafa0e888033fe358c61e3bdc69}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AArch64PreLegalizerCombiner.cpp&#125;::matchFoldGlobalOffset (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI, std::pair&lt; uint64&#95;t, uint64&#95;t &gt; &amp; MatchInfo)</>}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if it is possible to fold a constant into a G&#95;GLOBAL&#95;VALUE.
</SectionUser>

e.g.

g = G&#95;GLOBAL&#95;VALUE @x -&gt; g = G&#95;GLOBAL&#95;VALUE @x + cst

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64prelegalizercombiner-cpp/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64prelegalizercombiner-cpp">AArch64PreLegalizerCombiner.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### matchICmpRedundantTrunc() {#afa0ed64c2bf09a336fb47c9488d2880b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AArch64PreLegalizerCombiner.cpp&#125;::matchICmpRedundantTrunc (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselknownbits">GISelKnownBits</a> &#42; KB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp; MatchInfo)</>}>
Try to match a G&#95;ICMP of a G&#95;TRUNC with zero, in which the truncated bits are sign bits.

In this case, we can transform the G&#95;ICMP to directly compare the wide value with a zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64prelegalizercombiner-cpp/#l00075">75</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64prelegalizercombiner-cpp">AArch64PreLegalizerCombiner.cpp</a>.
